reviewText: The series was great.  I am a die-hard Gerard Butler fan and he  was perfect for that role.  I found out, tha hard way that the disk would not play on a standard DVD player.  The region 4 classification did not mean any thing to me a time of purchase.  the seller could have clarified the region 4 issue before purchase.  However, I found a machine on which,it would play an have enjoyed it thoroughly.  .

Quite nice sweet life story of suburban girl Lucy.
Funny and not funny life in London.
Relaxing film for young people.
I am a die-hard Gerard Butler fan. I bought this item only to watch Gerry when he was young. This was brilliant. What a fantastic actor cum singer GB is!!! WOW!

I bought this DVD because it had Gerard Butler in it. I ended up liking the whole ensemble of actors. The storyline was simple but it was a sit-com so it wasn't supposed to be anything heavy. The characters were likable, I watched because I wanted to see what happened next.
  I loved seeing Gerard in an early performance for him, even though he played the cad, but anyone who loves him knows this is a good role for him to play. You will not be disappointed if you buy this.

This funny performance is a sort of a "Sex and the City", of which characters are commoners of London with earthy English-average financial possibilities and the same range of problems people face building a nest wherever on a globe.
It was really a good movie.  (I guess it was a TV series)  It's well worth the price for any Gerard Butler fans even though he was a really rotten character.
